message.entry: Input of type {0} must be nonscalar
The split dimension must be a scalar and less than or equal to the dimensionality of the input array.
The split dimension must be an integer value.
The number of output arguments must equal the size of dimension {0,number,integer}.
The distribution pattern must be a column or a row vector.
The distribution pattern must only contain integer values.
The number of output arguments must equal the length of the distribution pattern.
Elements of the distribution pattern must sum to the size of dimension {0,number,integer}.
